data.comment: Waasland-Beveren kick-off to get the first-half underway.
At Stade du Pays de Charleroi, Daan Heymans has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 30, Waasland-Beveren's Andreas Wiegel has been booked in Charleroi.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Aboubakary Koita.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Marco Ilaimaharitra (Charleroi) is red-carded and dismissed.
Charleroi kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
The home team have replaced Jules Van Cleemput with Kaveh Rezaei. This is the first substitution made today by Karim Belhocine.
In the minute 62, The away team replace Andreas Wiegel with Jur Schryvers.
Saido Berahino is replacing Guillaume Gillet for Charleroi at Stade du Pays de Charleroi.
Nicky Hayen (Waasland-Beveren) is making a second substitution, with Aleksandar Vukotic replacing Georges Mandjeck.
In the minute 84, Karim Belhocine is making the team's third substitution at Stade du Pays de Charleroi with Ken Nkuba replacing Kayembe.
Leonardo Bertone (Waasland-Beveren) has received a first yellow card.
Ken Nkuba for Charleroi has been booked by Lothar D Hondt and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! Aboubakary Koita extends Waasland-Beveren's lead to 0-2.
Din Sula is replacing Aboubakary Koita for Waasland-Beveren at Stade du Pays de Charleroi.
